titles.title: Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to assure coverage for legal immigrant children and pregnant women under the Medicaid Program and the State children's health insurance program (SCHIP).
Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: Legal Immigrant Health Restoration Act of 2003 - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to ensure coverage for eligible permanent resident pregnant women and children under the Medicaid and SCHIP programs.
